attrs: Bonus +33 Strength +33 Agility +33 Intelligence +33% Health regen amplification +33% Lifesteal amplification +33 Attack speed +33% Spell damage +33% Status resistance +33% Mana loss reduction +33 Movement speed
info: The status resistance stacks diminishingly with other sources of status resistance.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple Yasha-based items ( Yasha, Sange and Yasha, Yasha and Kaya, Manta Style, Trident) do not stack.
Mana loss reduction and spell damage amplification from multiple Kaya-based items ( Kaya, Kaya and Sange, Yasha and Kaya, Bloodstone, Trident) do not stack.
Stacks additively with other sources of mana loss reduction.
